label: description
text: For our branch in Barcelona we are looking for a dispatcher (m/f/d) for international truck dispatching as soon as possible.

label: tasks
text: Quick decisions have to be made every day, with the highest possible quality in execution. After an appropriate training period, you will be expected to solve these tasks independently.

label: requirements
text: Training as a Management Assistant for Freight Forwarding and Logistic Services or similar

label: requirements
text: First professional experience in operational scheduling in a freight forwarding company

label: requirements
text: Good knowledge of the Office package

label: requirements
text: Ability to communicate and work in a team as well as independently

label: offer
text: The NEUFRA Speditions Group is an international medium-sized company with 33 branches in Europe. With more than 400 employees, we live an open corporate culture in a personal working environment. Our flat hierarchies not only promote a collegial atmosphere, but also independent work with autonomous decision-making. You can expect a future-proof job with the goal of long-term cooperation. To promote your professional and personal development, you will be offered individual further training opportunities. Furthermore, the remuneration for your performance consists of attractive salaries, which are supplemented with additional social benefits.
